sen.j: 静神社（しずかじんじゃ）は京都府京丹後市網野町にある神社である。
sen.e: Shizuka-jinsya Shrine is a shrine, that is located in Amino-cho, Kyotango City, Kyoto Prefecture
Shizuka-jinsya Shrine is a shrine that is located in Amino-cho, Kyotango City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Shizuka-jinja Shrine is a shrine that is located in Amino-cho, Kyotango City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 主祭神は静御前（しずかごぜん）。
sen.e: Its shusaijin (main enshrined deities) is Shizuka Gozen.
Its shusaijin (main enshrined deities) is Shizuka Gozen.
Its shusaijin (main enshrined deities) is Shizuka Gozen.

sen.j: 源義経の愛妾であった静御前を祀っている。
sen.e: MINAMOTO no Yoritomo's favorite concubine, Shizuka Gozen is enshrined.
MINAMOTO no Yoritomo's favorite concubine, Shizuka Gozen is enshrined.
MINAMOTO no Yoritomo's favorite concubine, Shizuka Gozen is enshrined.

sen.j: 1782年に火災で焼失したため、元の場所より200m西に再建されたのが現在の静神社であると言われている。
sen.e: It is said that the shrine, which was reerected in 200m west from the original place after original Shizuka-jinjya Shrine was burned down in 1782, is present Shizuka-jinjya Shrine,
It is said that the shrine, which was re-erected 200m west of its original place after the original Shizuka-jinjya Shrine was burned down in 1782.
It is said that the shrine, which was re-erected 200 m west of its original place after the original Shizuka-jinja Shrine was burned down in 1782.

sen.j: 京都府 京丹後市 網野町 磯
sen.e: Iso, Amino-cho, Tango City, Kyoto Prefecture
Iso, Amino-cho, Tango City, Kyoto Prefecture
Iso, Amino-cho, Kyotango City, Kyoto Prefecture

sen.j: 北近畿タンゴ鉄道 北近畿タンゴ鉄道宮津線 網野駅からタクシー10分
sen.e: 10 minutes by taxi from Kitakinki Tango Railway, Kitakinki Tango Railway Miyazu Line, Amino Station
10 minutes by taxi from the Kitakinki Tango Railway, Kitakinki Tango Railway Miyazu Line, Amino Station
10 minutes by taxi from the Kitakinki Tango Railway, Kitakinki Tango Railway Miyazu Line, Amino Station
